It is empty here, you cannot feel anything, you feel as if a god mistakenly put you here. What now?
you stand in a stone walled corridor, lit by a grate above you, there is a door to the east, west and north. What now?
this room is almost completely dark, but a small crack in the door lets some light in, the door out of this cell is to the west. What now?
you cannot see anything here, from your memory you can remember went west to get in here, so the exit is to the east. What now?
you can see here, something catches your eye. A hiddeen passageway imbedded in the west wall. What now?
you can see here. There is an exit to the west UNDER DEVELOPEMENT DO NOT CROSS INTO VOID and a hidden passage to the east. What now?
